articles.title: S. Korea Urged to Clarify Its Ulterior Design before Whole Nation
articles.content:
S. Korea Urged to Clarify Its Ulterior Design before Whole Nation
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK issued a statement on Thursday in view of the very disturbing grave situation in south Korea.
					 The south Korean authorities have become frantic with the racket of confrontation with compatriots in the north these days contrary to the sincere efforts made by the DPRK to improve the north-south relations and achieve the reconciliation and unity of the nation.
					
					 Its typical example is that they dared hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK as regards the field guidance given by it to a baby home and orphanage and the schedule of the election of the deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, etc. while unhesitatingly perpetrating reckless acts of groundlessly hurting the social system in the DPRK.
					
					 At the moment when the north and the south were reaching an agreement on the reunion of separated families and their relatives at Panmunjom, the south Korean authorities let formations of U.S. B-52 nuclear-capable bombers based on Guam fly into the sky above Jik islet in the West Sea of Korea for a whole day for staging drills for a nuclear strike at the DPRK. 
					
					 The south Korean warmongers are busy making final arrangements to go ahead with Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint war exercises as scheduled, claiming that they are irrelevant to humanitarianism.
					
					 Shortly ago they, defying the repeated warnings of the DPRK,  openly staged such naval strike drill targeting it under the signboard of "regular drills" on Paekryong and Yonphyong islands, the hotspots in the West Sea, though it is taking a goodwill measure to halt military hostile acts first.
					
					 The Policy Department of the NDC of the DPRK clarifies the following principled stand reflecting the unanimous will of its service personnel and people:
					
					 First, the DPRK will be compelled to consider the implementation of the agreement reached as long as the dignity of its supreme leadership is malignantly hurt and the acts of groundlessly slandering and defaming its social system persist. 
					
					 Nothing is more foolish than the calculation that reconciliation and cooperation can be achieved while the reckless remarks hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK are floated and connived at under the pretext of "liberal democracy" and media's smear campaign against it is going on under the pretence of "freedom of speech".
					
					 The south Korean authorities should bear in mind that the consequences of the smear campaign against the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system will be unpredictably disastrous whether it is spearheaded by the authorities or staged by media.
					
					 Second, we will not remain a passive on-looker to their farce staged allegedly to build confidence when formations of U.S. nuclear strategic bombers are flying into the sky, threatening and blackmailing against fellowmen.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which has instigated the south Korean authorities, claiming they should react to the DPRK's principled and crucial proposal and open letter ardently appealing to the Koreans by raising the nuclear issue.
					
					 It is again the U.S. which is throwing all sorts of obstacles to the DPRK's patriotic and positive efforts to create an atmosphere for improving the inter-Korean relations and chilling them.
					
					 Third, we would like to take this opportunity to clarify once again that war exercises and racket for confrontation are incompatible with dialogue and reconciliation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should get rid of the existing state of affairs and stance, abandon their narrow-minded prejudice and inveterate motive of confrontation and make a bold policy decision to meet the expectation of the nation.
					
					 They should no longer pursue such distrust and confrontation as rejecting the warm sincerity of their compatriots with evil will and reacting to compatriots' call for reconciliation with hostile war drills and nuclear threat.
					
					 They should neither misjudge nor abuse with a wrong way of thinking the goodwill, tolerance, patience and self-restraint shown by the service personnel and people of the DPRK to pave the way for improving the north-south relations in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 All Koreans in the north, south and abroad will closely follow the stand the south Korean authorities are obliged to clarify and their future attitude.

articles.title: Conference of SubWorkteam Leaders in Agricultural Sector Opens
articles.content:
Conference of SubWorkteam Leaders in Agricultural Sector Opens
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A national conference of subworkteam leaders in the agricultural sector opened at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium Thursday.
					 The meeting opened on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the theses on the socialist rural question published by President Kim Il Sung marks an important occasion in upholding, preserving and glorifying the undying feats performed by the President and leader Kim Jong Il for the rural construction and the development of the nation's agriculture under the leadership of the party.
					
					 The conference is to review the achievements and experience gained in the agricultural production in the past and discuss tasks and ways for the agricultural workers to hit the goal of grain production set by the Party.
					
					 Present there were Pak Pong Ju, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Ki Nam and other senior party, state and army officials, chief secretaries of provincial committees of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions. Also attending it were exemplary sub-workteam leaders across the country, leading officials in the field of agriculture in provinces, cities and counties and officials of relevant units.
					
					 Prior to the conference, the participants listened to the recorded speech "Let Us Thoroughly Implement the Theses on the Socialist Rural Question" made by President Kim Il Sung at the second session of the 9th Central People's Committee of the DPRK on June 22 and 23, Juche 79 (1990).
					
					 Conveyed at the conference was a letter "Let Us Bring About Innovations in Agricultural Production under the Unfurled Banner of the Socialist Rural Theses" sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un to the participants in the conference.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and premier of the Cabinet, made a report.
					
					 He referred to the undying exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who opened up the new history of socialist rural construction and devoted all their lives to the development of agriculture of the country.
					
					 Kim Il Sung deemed it as an important issue to strengthen the subworkteams, the grassroots level units and cells of communal labor and life, and established an original subworkteam management system, he said and went on:
					
					 The subworkteam management system is a form of production organization that encourages all farmers to take part in production and management as befitting masters with the feeling of attachment to the collective economy and its vitality has been fully displayed in the course of increasing the agricultural production and improving the farm management.
					
					 Kim Jong Il put forth policies of bringing about a radical change in farming in the Songun era and energetically guided their implementation.
					
					 The subworkteam management system was consolidated to be an advantageous management and distribution system of our style that gives full play to the patriotic zeal and devoted efforts of the agricultural workers under the leadership of Kim Jong Il. It has put strong spurs to the development of the socialist rural economy system.
					
					 A turn being effected in the overall agricultural field including production of grain, livestock farming and fruit farming is a precious fruition of the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un who has made indefatigable efforts for the development of the nation's agriculture, the reporter said, adding:
					
					Socialist agriculture in the country has made shining achievements, covering the proud path of victory under the outstanding and seasoned leadership of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The successes made in the agricultural production are associated with the unrewarded efforts made by subworkteam leaders across the country.
					
					 The reporter called on the subworkteam leaders and other officials of primary organizations in farms and economic guidance organs to raise a fierce wind of making fresh leap forward in the socialist rural construction and agricultural production.
					
					 Speeches were made at the conference.
					
					 It goes on.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate Calls on UN to Pay Due Attention to World War II Crimes
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Calls on UN to Pay Due Attention to World War II Crimes 
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegate clarified the DPRK's principled stand on ensuring world peace and security at an open seminar sponsored by the UN Security Council on the theme "War and peace" on Jan. 29.
					 The delegate in his speech said the principle of respect for sovereignty of other countries and non-interference in other's internal affairs should be adhered to as a fundamental principle governing the international relations from the stand of ensuring world peace and security.
					
					 There may be small and big countries in the world but there exists no such a law allowing a big country to infringe upon the interests and sovereignty of small one, he said, adding: 
					
					 One should no longer allow a specified UN member state to override the UN Charter and the principle of equal sovereignty by abusing its privileged position in the UN while misusing the UN for its selfish purpose of actions against other member state.
					
					 Underlining the need for the UN to pay due attention to the crimes committed against humanity during the World War II and exert efforts for their settlement, he continued:
					
					 The crimes committed by Japan against the Koreans and the Chinese and peoples of Southeast Asian countries in the past are serious matters common to humankind as they were unprecedented in history in their barbarous and cruel nature.
					
					 Japan, a defeated nation, is trying hard to dodge the settlement of the crimes committed by its ancestors and cover them up. Moreover, it is making no scruple of rubbing salt into the wounds of the people of those countries which fell victim to it.
					
					 A typical example of this is the visit of the prime minister of Japan to Yasukuni Shrine.
					
					 His visit to the shrine is an anachronistic attitude intended to imbue Japanese with a wild militarist ambition in a bid to encourage them in repeating crimes against humanity as it will drive Japan into a final ruin.
					
					 During their military occupation of Korea the Japanese imperialists mercilessly massacred at least one million Koreans, forced 200,000 Korean women into sexual slavery, abducted and took away more than 8.4 million Koreans to slave labor sites and shambles of war of aggression. Such crimes committed by Japan can never be written off.
					
					The Korean people will certainly make Japan pay a dear price for the bloodshed by their grandfathers and grandmothers.

articles.title: Title of Chieftain Awarded to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Title of Chieftain Awarded to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un were presented with the title of honorary chieftain of Gusau City, Zamfara State in Nigeria.
					 A ceremony of conveying the certificates of the title took place in the city on Jan. 29.
					
					 Present there were figures of all social strata and masses in the State and the DPRK ambassador to Nigeria and his embassy officials.
					
					 The certificates were conveyed to the ambassador by the chieftain.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the ceremony.

articles.title: National Cooking Competition Held
articles.content:
National Cooking Competition Held
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A national cooking competition was held at the Pyongyang Noodle House on Feb. 5 and 6 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Cooks of 40 institutions selected through competitions at public catering establishments of provinces (municipalities), ministries and national institutions competed, being divided into fields of public service, ministries, national institutions, hotels, Pyongyang City and provinces.
					
					 Six cooks from each team were assigned certain dishes in the limited time as well as meat and fish dishes which they invented.
					
					 The competitors skillfully made chicken soup boiled with ginseng, mudfish soup, fried buns stuffed with red-bean jam, zeppoles, peculiar steamed, boiled and roasted dishes.
					
					 Demonstration cooking by excellent cooks was also given during the competition.

articles.title: Coal Production Goes Up at Tokchon Area Coal-Mining Complex
articles.content:
Coal Production Goes Up at Tokchon Area Coal-Mining Complex 
 Tokchon, February 6 (KCNA) -- Coal production is going up at the Tokchon Area Coal-Mining Complex. 
					 The miners have carried out the daily production quota of the complex at 110 percent in the same spirit as displayed in hitting the production target for January.
					
					 The workers at Tokchon and Toksong coal mines have carried out their daily production quota at more than 120 percent by pushing tunneling ahead of other work and bringing about collective innovations.
					
					 The Wolbong and Hyongbong coal mines have boosted the coal production by encouraging their workers to display creative initiative, introducing effective mining methods and organizing a socialist emulation for increased production.
					
					 The per shift coal production jumped and belt conveyors and other transport means were operated in full capacity at Jenam and Namyang coal mines.
					
					 Those coal mines are also pushing ahead with the work to secure sufficient new rich coal fields by concentrating efforts on heading tunneling and the preparations for it while pressing forward the coal production.

articles.title: Number of "Our Classroom" Literary Prize Winners on Increase
articles.content:
Number of "Our Classroom" Literary Prize Winners on Increase
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The number of winners of "Our Classroom" Literary Prize is steadily increasing among school youth and children in the DPRK.
					 A prize contest for literary works is an annual event in the country.
					
					 Over 300 more literary works entered the contest than the previous one. 
					
					 Among the recipients of the prize are Ri Yu Jong, student of Taedoksan Senior Secondary School in Jangphung County, Han Ryu Gyong, student of Kumsonggori Primary School in Taesong District in Pyongyang, brothers Kim Mu Song and Kim Mu Gwang, students of Chongryu Junior Secondary School and Chongryu Primary School in Taedonggang District in Pyongyang. The number of the prize winners reached at least 11,000, taking the country as a whole.
					
					 The students created works, reflecting their loyal determination to glorify forever the imperishable exploits of the great persons of Mt. Paektu and prepare themselves as reliable successors to the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Among those works are children poems "We Miss You General Very Much" and "Padded Clothes of the Generalissimo", children song "Marshal's Journey to the Front"," diary "We Wish to Sing of All Blessings", essay "How Will the Flower of Five Marks Come into Bloom" and others with diverse themes and genres.
					
					 Its awarding ceremony took place at the Hall of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League on Thursday.

articles.title: DPRK's Sports Aces (4)
articles.content:
DPRK's Sports Aces (4)
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Ku Yong Jo (July 1955-March 2001), a winner of the title of People's Athlete, was a famous boxer who remains in the memory of the DPRK people. 
					 Born in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province, Ku began to learn boxing at the age of 12.
					
					 When he was 17 years old, he joined the Amnokgang Sports Team and rose to fame as national champion in the 48 kg category.
					
					 His boxing techniques were fully demonstrated at the 4th International Boxing Tournament for Golden Belt in Juche 64 (1975). In the tournament, Ku defeated his Romanian rival, a European champion, and Turkish rival in the 54 kg category to win a golden belt and a gold medal.
					
					 At that time, a number of foreign media spoke highly of his boxing techniques.
					
					 He took the titles at the 5th and 6th international boxing tournaments for Golden Belt, thus becoming a thrice golden-belt winner.
					
					 He bagged a gold medal in the 54 kg category at the 21st Olympic Games. In the games, all of his matches came under spotlight of experts and spectators.
					
					 He also took the titles in the 7th and 8th Asian games, bringing the number of his gold medals to more than 10.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Feats
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Feats
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The politico-ideological power under socialism is a fruition of tireless efforts and devotion made by leader Kim Jong Il and a precious legacy left by him, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 After laying down the principle of the theory on ideology of Juche in his early days, Kim Jong Il paid primary attention to training the popular masses to be powerful beings armed with the Juche idea and put the ideological work above anything else in the whole period of steering the revolution and construction.
					
					 Under his energetic guidance the Korean people have been equipped with the independent spirit of carving out their destiny by their own efforts, have emerged fighters defending the headquarters of the revolution at the risk of their lives and have grown strong in ideology and faith embodying the revolutionary idea of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in practice.
					
					 The DPRK took a wide avenue for building a thriving nation, overcoming all difficulties in the period of the Arduous March and Forced March. This was possible thanks to the might of ideology and inexhaustible mental power of the popular masses. In those days when a mere survival was considered as a miracle Korean people operated machines despite hunger and carried compost to the fields braving snowstorm, believing in their own strength. They were strong enough in ideology to weather economic difficulties. As a result, all moves of the imperialists went bust and the red flag of socialism fluttered more vigorously across the country.
					
					 The history of his revolutionary leadership is a glorious one in which he successfully achieved the unbreakable unity and cohesion of the party and the revolutionary ranks, regarding the single-minded unity as a revolutionary philosophy of the WPK, mainstay of the revolution.
					
					 Under his guidance the WPK and revolutionary ranks have grown stronger in revolutionary comradeship based on loyalty to the leader and the DPRK emerged a country which boasts single-minded unity as all its service personnel and people take the same step and say in one voice.
					
					 The DPRK has firmly adhered to the principle of Juche, the principle of national independence in the revolution and construction under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 There can be no such practice as reading other's face or following other's style and method in the DPRK as it applies a revolutionary method, fighting mode and way of living of Korean style to all fields from a firm independent stand.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Clarifies Principle to Be Maintained in Struggle
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Clarifies Principle to Be Maintained in Struggle
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- It  is a fundamental principle to be consistently adhered to by all countries and nations to firmly protect and meet the independent requirements and interests of the popular masses, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 Noting the international situation remains very complicated, the article goes on:
					
					 The imperialists are openly perpetrating military intervention and acts of aggression against sovereign states, seriously infringing upon the sovereignty of some countries.
					
					 Due to the imperialists' outrageous moves for aggression and pressure, some countries are now yielding to them and compromising with them, failing to say what they should do.
					
					 A typical example of this is the situation in Iraq.
					
					 History shows that if a country takes a step back in face of threats of the imperialists, it has to make two steps back, compelling itself to make ten steps back, and finally it will not be able to accomplish the popular masses' cause of independence.
					
					 The victory of the cause of independence is unthinkable without a struggle against the imperialists.
					
					 One should not harbor even an iota of illusion about the imperialists but stage an uncompromising struggle against them without making even the slightest concession. 
					
					 The imperialists and all class enemies are now expecting some "changes" to take place in the countries aspiring after independence against imperialism.
					
					 However, countries strong in their principle and the peoples who adhere to it will neither collapse nor be conquered. This is the truth proved by history.

articles.title: Probing Truth behind Attempted Rebellion Case Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probing Truth behind Attempted Rebellion Case Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The measure committee for denouncing Intelligence Service's fabrication of the plotted rebellion case and suppression under the pretext of public security held a press conference in Seoul on Tuesday calling for probing truth behind the attempted rebellion case. 
					 The measure committee is composed of civic and social organizations including the Solidarity for Progress and the Confederation of Trade Unions of south Korea.
					
					 At the conference the speakers termed the attempted rebellion case of the Unified Progressive Party a case of suppression under the pretext of public security cooked up by the regime to tide over its ruling crisis.
					
					 The case is similar to those which had been hatched by the erstwhile dictatorial regimes whenever they faced crises but ended with declaration of not-guilty, they noted.
					
					 They said they would stage a campaign for probing truth behind the IS's illegal interference in the election and the attempted rebellion case.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Denounces Japan for Denying Past History
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Denounces Japan for Denying Past History
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on February 2 carried an editorial denouncing Japan's ceaseless provocations over the issue of history. 
					 The editorial said:
					
					 Japan is getting evermore pronounced in making provocations over the issue of history. 
					
					 Some time ago, Japanese Prime Minister Abe was asked questions concerning the understanding of history four times at a Diet session, but he evaded expressions like "colonial domination" and "aggression". 
					
					 He voiced the stand to disregard the advice of the international community including the UN Anti-Torture Committee which urged Japan to make apology and reparation to the victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. He even said he would refer the issue of "dominium over Tok islets" to the International Court of Justice. 
					
					 The present Japanese government is more undisguised in denying the history than the other governments in the past. Such provocation is more dangerous as it is related with the moves to turn Japan into a military giant including the attempt to change the interpretation of the constitution for the exercise of the right to "collective self-defense." 
					
					 His reckless remarks are sparking off anger of the international community. 
					
					 Japan should come to its senses, though belatedly. If Japan disregards this, it will face international isolation.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Protest against Japan's Moves to Revive Militarism
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Protest against Japan's Moves to Revive Militarism
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Members of the students' headquarters of the Movement for One Korea and students in Seoul held a press conference Monday in Seoul in protest against Japan's moves to revive militarism, according to Thongil News, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 At the conference speakers denounced Japan for embellishing its history of aggression and seeking a war again.
					
					 Noting Japan's revival of militarism has become a factor of threatening peace in Northeast Asia, they urged the Japanese government to abandon its wild ambition for reinvasion.
					
					 Then, a protest letter addressed to the Japanese government was read out there.
					
					 The letter accused the Japanese government of its reckless remarks and acts aimed at distorting its history.
					
					 It termed Japan's attempt to exercise the "right to collective self-defense" and rearm itself a base one totally going against the spirit of its Pacifist Constitution and the desire of its people for peace in Asia.
					
					 It expressed strong opposition to Japan's moves to revive militarism and rearm itself.
					
					 It demanded the government of Japan stop its distortion of its history of aggression and visits to Yasukuni Shrine, admit the crimes it committed in the past against Koreans by enforcing sexual slavery and forcible drafting and make an apology and reparation for them.
					
					 The participants in the conference in a letter to students and other young people called on them to take the lead in the struggle to protect peace on the Korean peninsula against Japan's rearmament, bearing deep in mind the distress-torn history in which the Korean nation had been trampled down by Japanese imperialism.
					
					 At the end of the conference they thrust the protest letter to the Japanese embassy.
					
					 Students declared that they would stage a demonstration in Seoul every day in protest against Japan's revival of militarism, participate in the on-going Wednesday meeting for settling the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and launch protest actions in Japan on Friday and Saturday.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Call for Peace, Reunification of Korea
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Call for Peace, Reunification of Korea
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Overseas Koreans held seminars for peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula in Seattle in the U.S. and Vancouver in Canada on Feb 1 and 2, according to Minjok Thongsin, internet newspaper of Koreans in the U.S.
					 Present there were Koreans in the U.S. and Canada.
					
					 Speakers said a stumbling block lying in the way of peace and reunification of Korea is outsiders and forces sycophantic toward the U.S.
					
					 Politicians and media of the U.S. and Japan are too ignorant of the DPRK, they said.
					
					 They stressed overseas Koreans will conduct positive activities to realize peace and reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Swiss Organization
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was posted by the Switzerland-Korea Committee on its website on January 26.
					 The work, made public on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line and the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea are an effective political mode of the present era which carried forward President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to arms and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode fully meeting the requirements of the times and revolution.

articles.title: DPRK's Greatest Holidays to Be Marked in Cambodia
articles.content:
DPRK's Greatest Holidays to Be Marked in Cambodia
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A Cambodian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) and the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated on Feb.1.
					 Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the instruction of King Norodom Sihamoni. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to give wide publicity to the imperishable revolutionary exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il through media and hold diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of their birth anniversaries.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed in Benin, Nigeria
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed in Benin, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries in the run-up to the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 A meeting and film show were held by the Socialist Party of Benin, a lecture and film show by the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics and a photo exhibition by the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria between January 24 and February 1.
					
					 Displayed in the photo exhibition were photos documenting the revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il and photos introducing achievements made by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in the drive to build a thriving nation. 
					
					 The participants of the film show watched Korean films. 
					
					 The vice-president of the Socialist Party of Benin said in his speech that Kim Jong Il consolidated the politico-ideological position of the DPRK as firm as a rock and ushered in a new era of building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 Ahmed Blaza Lawan, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics, in a lecture said Kim Jong Il gave scientific and lucid answers to the theoretical and practical matters arising in the revolution and construction with his rare insight and performed great ideological and theoretical exploits. 
					
					 A director of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria said in a speech at the opening ceremony of the photo exhibition that the exploits of Kim Jong Il would be always remembered by progressive mankind.
					
					 A message of greeting to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Benin.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed in Various Countries
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A seminar, a film show and a photo exhibition took place in Romania, Tajikistan and Bangladesh between January 25 and 29 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il authored many works including "Socialism Is a Science", proving the inevitability of the victory of socialism and wisely led the building of a thriving nation in the DPRK and the global cause of independence, holding high the banner of Songun.
					
					 Progressive mankind will always remember the immortal exploits performed by him in the global cause of independence.
					
					 Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, said that Kim Jong Il developed the Songun politics unprecedented in the human history of politics into a main political mode under socialism and overcame great difficulties with its might.
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, said that Kim Jong Il possessed of the greatest idea and leadership ability performed shining exploits in the global cause of independence.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was formed by the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on Jan. 30.
					 First Secretary Alexandr Gromov of the committee was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Italy
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Italy
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- An Italian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in Rome on January 30. 
					 Franco Constanzi, secretary general of the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events including seminar and lecture praising the exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Germany
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Germany
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A German preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Erfurt on January 30.
					 Torsten Schoevitz, chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and organize diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Portavoz de Departamento de Politica de CDN demanda verdadero intento de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz de Departamento de Politica de CDN demanda verdadero intento de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 6 una declaracion en relacion con que en el suelo surcoreano ocurre la situacion demasiado grave.
					En estos dias, las autoridades surcoreanas recurren obstinadamente a la campana de confrontacion fratricida despreciando la sinceridad y los esfuerzos de la RPDC de mejorar las relaciones con el Sur de Corea y lograr la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion.
					
					El ejemplo tipico es que ellas calumnian sin titubeo la maxima dignidad de la RPDC cuestionando la inspeccion en el terreno de nuestra Direccion Suprema al asilo para ninos y el orfanato, la agenda de la eleccion a los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema, etc. y difaman sin fundamento nuestro sistema.
					
					En el mismo tiempo en que ambas partes  discutian en Phanmunjom el acuerdo para realizar el encuentro de los familiares y parientes separados, hicieron librar todo el dia los bombarderos estrategicos nucleares "B-52" de EE.UU. despegados de la isla Guam en el espacio sobre la isla Jik del Mar Oeste de Corea el simulacro de ataque nuclear anti-RPDC. 
					
					Los belicistas de la capa militar del Sur de Corea se acaloran en los preparativos finales con el intento de desplegar segun el programa los ejercicios belicos conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" diciendo que estos no estan relacionados con el humanitarismo.
					
					A pesar de nuestras repetidas advertencias, hace poco libraron abiertamente los ejercicios de ataque maritimo que nos irritan so pretexto de los "regulares" en las islas Paekryong y Yonphyong, zonas candentes del Mar Oeste de Corea, en que tomamos medidas de buena fe de cesar primero los actos hostiles militares.
					
					Senala la nota y subraya:
					
					En reflejo de la voluntad unanime de nuestro ejercito y pueblo, el Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea aclara la siguiente posicion de principios:
					
					1. Mientras desacreditan atrozmente nuestra dignidad suprema y continuan las calumnias absurdas contra nuestro regimen, estaremos obligados a tomar en consideracion la ejecucion del acuerdo ya aprobado.
					
					Sera una actitud muy absurda si piensan en que se pueden lograr la reconciliacion y cooperacion permitiendo difundir las calumnias contra nuestra dignidad suprema bajo el rotulo del "sistema democratico liberal" y seguir las censuras de los medios de prensa contra la RPDC so pretexto de la "libertad de palabra".
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben darse clara cuenta de que las calumnias contra la  suprema dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC causaran el imprevisible resultado catastrofico independientemente de que las autoridades las controlen o la prensa las ejecute.
					
					2. No estaremos con los brazos cruzados ante la farsa de que en el cielo vuela la escuadrilla de bombarderos estrategicos nucleares norteamericanos chantajeando y amenazando a la RPDC y en la tierra fingian atarearse a acumular la confianza.
					
					  EE.UU. instigo a las autoridades surcoreanas a enfrentarse con el problema nuclear en cuanto a nuestra propuesta importante de principios y el mensaje publico que conmueve a todos los coreanos.
					
					  Es precisamente EE.UU. el estorbador que crea los obstaculos de toda indole y echa agua fria a nuestros esfuerzos activos llenos de amor a la nacion y al pueblo por fomentar el ambiente favorable a la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					3. En esta oportunidad volvemos a aclarar evidentemente que son incompatibles el dialogo y el entrenamiento de guerra de agresion, la reconciliacion y la campana de confrontacion.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben liberarse de la posicion anterior, abandonar el prejuicio estrecho y la acostumbrada naturaleza de confrontacion y tomar una valiente decision politica adecuada a la esperanza de la nacion.
					
					Ademas, no deben recurrir por mas tiempo a la desconfianza y enfrentamiento negando con mala intencion la cordial bondad de los connacionales y respondiendo a la propuesta de reconciliacion de estos con los ejercicios de guerra de caracter hostil y chantaje nuclear.
					
					No deben abusar con alma torcida de buena voluntad, magnanimidad, paciencia y dominio de si mismos de nuestro ejercito y pueblo tendentes a abrir la salida de la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur con la fuerza unida de los connacionales.
					
					Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar vigilaran agudamente la posicion a ser esclarecida por las autoridades surcoreanas y sus acciones posteriores al respecto. -0-

articles.title: Inaugurada Conferencia Nacional de Jefes de Equipo de Sector Agricola
articles.content:
Inaugurada Conferencia Nacional de Jefes de Equipo de Sector Agricola
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada hoy en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang la Conferencia Nacional de Jefes de Equipo del Sector Agricola.
					El presente conclave, sostenido en ocasion del 50o aniversario de que el Presidente Kim Il Sung publicara la tesis sobre el problema rural socialista, deviene un motivo importante para defender y glorificar bajo la direccion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea las imperecederas hazanas de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu en la construccion rural y el desarrollo agricola del pais.
					
					La conferencia hara balance de los exitos y experiencias logrados en la produccion agricola en el pasado y discutira las tareas y los remedios que se presentan ante los trabajadores agricolas para lograr la meta de produccion cerealera presentada por el partido.
					
					En la ocasion participaron Pak Pong Ju, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Ki Nam y otros cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los secretarios responsables de los comites provinciales del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los ejemplares jefes de equipo de todo el pais, los funcionarios de la rama agricola de las provincias, ciudades y distritos y funcionarios de las unidades concernientes.
					
					Antes de iniciar la conferencia los participantes escucharon por medio de grabacion el discurso del Presidente Kim Il Sung "Materialicemos cabalmente la tesis sobre el problema rural socialista en nuestro pais" pronunciado los dias 22 y 23 de junio del 79 (1990) de la Era Juche en la segunda reunion del 9o periodo del Comite Popular Central de la RPDC.
					
					Se dio lectura al mensaje del Mariscal Kim Jong Un a los participantes de la conferencia "Renovemos la produccion agricola con la bandera de la tesis rural socialista en alto".
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC.
					
					El informante se refirio a las hazanas de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il quienes prepararon la nueva historia de la construccion rural socialista y dedicaron toda su vida por el desarrollo agricola del pais, y prosiguio:
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung presento como asunto importante intensificar el equipo, que es la unidad  de base y la celula del trabajo conjunto y la vida colectiva, y creo el autoctono sistema de autogestion del equipo.
					
					El mencionado sistema es la forma de organizacion de produccion que posibilita a todos los granjeros a tener el apego a la administracion conjunta y participar como dueno en la produccion y la administracion, y su vitalidad se puso de pleno manifiesto en el proceso de incrementar la produccion agricola y renovar constantemente la gestion agricola.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il presento la orientacion de la revolucion agricola de la epoca del Songun y dirigio con abnegacion la lucha por realizarla.
					
					Bajo su guia, el citado sistema se consolido como el mas ventajoso de administracion y reparticion a estilo nuestro que fomenta activamente el entusiasmo patriotico y la devocion laboral de los trabajadores agricolas y se impulso vigorosamente la intensificacion del sistema de economia rural socialista.
					
					El informante agrego que gracias a la sabia direccion del Mariscal quien dedica incansables trabajos por el desarrollo agricola del pais, se registra hoy el cambio en la rama agricola inclusive la produccion de cereales, la ganaderia y la fruticultura.
					
					Bajo la destacada y sabia direccion de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu se lograron brillantes exitos en la agricultura socialista de la RPDC, apunto.
					
					Enfatizo que en estos exitos estan impregnados los esfuerzos desconocidos de los jefes de equipo de todo el pais.
					
					Destaco que los funcionarios de base del campo inclusive los jefes de equipo y los funcionarios de la economia deben levantar la ola de nuevos saltos en la construccion rural socialista y la produccion agricola.
					
					En la reunion hubo intervenciones.
					
					La conferencia continua.

articles.title: Delegado de RPDC exige a ONU a prestar atencion a crimen antietico en Segunda Guerra Mundial
articles.content:
Delegado de RPDC exige a ONU a prestar atencion a crimen antietico en Segunda Guerra Mundial
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- En el debate publico sobre la "Guerra y Paz" efectuado el 29 de enero en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, el delegado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea aclaro la posicion de principios de esta en cuanto a la preservacion de la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					El subrayo la necesidad de mantener el principio del respeto de soberania y no intervencion en los asuntos internos como el principio fundamental de las relaciones internacionales desde el punto de vista de la preservacion de paz y seguridad del mundo y continuo:
					
					 En el mundo existen grandes o pequenos paises, pero no hay la ley que les permite a los primeros perjudicar los intereses y la soberania de los  segundos.
					
					 No hay que tolerar mas el que un pais miembro de la ONU gobierna la Carta de la ONU y los principios de igualdad de soberania abusando de su posicion privilegiada en dicha organizacion internacional y hace uso fraudulento de ella en su meta egoista contra otros paises miembros.
					
					  La ONU debe prestar merecida atencion y esfuerzo al crimen antietico cometido en el periodo de la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
					
					  El crimen de Japon cometido contra Corea, China y otros paises del Sudeste Asiatico, es el grave tema comun de la humanidad sin precedente en la historia en su brutalidad.
					
					  Japon, pais derrotado, intenta negar y encubrir la liquidacion del crimen cometido por sus antepasados y no vacila en dar sablazos a la herida de corazon de los paises danados.
					
					 Su ejemplo es la visita del premier japones al santuario Yasukuni.
					
					 La visita de Abe deviene el acto anacronico tendente a inducir otra vez a los habitantes al crimen antietico inculcandoles la ambicion militarista y llevar su pais isla a la total destruccion.
					
					  Durante la ocupacion militar de Corea, los imperialitas japoneses asesinaron sin piedad a mas de un millon de personas, obligaron a 200 mil coreanas una vida de esclavitud sexual y raptaron y arrestaron a mas de 8 millones 400 mil coreanos para lanzarles al trabajo esclavista y la guerra agresiva.
					
					  Por mucho que transcurra el tiempo ellos no podran encubrir tales crimenes del pasado, y el pueblo coreano cobrara sin falta el precio de sangre de rencor arraigado de los antepasados.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun elogia proezas de Kim Jong Il en construccion de potencia ideo-politica
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun elogia proezas de Kim Jong Il en construccion de potencia ideo-politica
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual del dia 6, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que la potencia ideo-politica socialista deviene el resultado de los esfuerzos abnegados del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el valioso patrimonio de toda su vida.
					El Dirigente, quien aclaro muy temprano el principio de la ideologia del Juche, presto atencion prioritaria en todo el periodo de su direccion sobre la revolucion y la construccion a formar a las masas populares como seres fuertes armados con la idea Juche y antepuso la labor ideologica en todos los asuntos, apunta y prosigue:
					
					Gracias a la energica direccion del Dirigente, el pueblo coreano se ha convertido en el poseedor del espiritu independiente, con el cual forja su destino con sus propias fuerzas, en los combatientes que defienden a costa de vida la Direccion de la Revolucion, y en los fuertes en la ideologia y la conviccion, que prueban con practicas la idea revolucionaria de nuestro partido.
					
					En el periodo de la Marcha penosa, la forzada nuestra patria supero todas las dificultades y comenzo a construir un Estado prospero, cuyo clave principal reside en la fuerza de ideologia y en las inagotables fuerzas espirituales de las masas populares.
					
					En aquel periodo tan dificil, los obreros operaron las maquinas y los campesinos llevaron al campo los humus aunque tenian hambre confiando solo en sus propias fuerzas. 
					
					Por el poderio de la ideologia, fueron superadas las dificultades economicas, se vieron invalidas las maniobras de los imperialistas y se flameo mas fuerte que nunca la bandera roja del socialismo sobre esta tierra patria.
					
					La historia de guia del Dirigente sobre la revolucion esta caracterizada por una trayectoria sagrada en que realizo la unidad inquebrantable del Partido y las filas revolucionarias presentando la unidad monolitica como filosofia revolucionaria de nuestro partido y lo mas importante en la revolucion.
					
					Gracias a la sabia direccion del Dirigente, nuestro partido y  nuestras filas revolucionarias se han hecho mas solidos con la camaraderia basada en la fidelidad al lider y nuestra patria ostenta su fisonomia como pais unido como un solo hombre.
					
					Nuestra patria ha venido materializado estrictamente el principio del Juche, el de la independencia nacional en la revolucion y la construccion bajo la sabia guia del Dirigente.
					
					En nuestro pais, que mantiene con firmeza el espiritu independiente y materializa el modo de la revolucion, la lucha y la vida a estilo coreano en todos los dominios, no sucedera ni una minima cosa que lisonjee a los ajenos o siga el estilo extranjero.
